name: 黃希敏
objective: 本課程旨在進一步加強學生的口語表達溝通之能力。經由合宜的活動設計，如小組討論，與英語談話情境的塑造，如面談，學生將獲得充分機會以演練聽講的技巧。
schedule:
o　　Week 1: Introduction
o　　Week 2: Toying with Disaster 
o　　Week 3: Scoop Dreams 
o　　Week 4: Send in the Crowns 
o　　Week 5: The Last Supper 
o　　Week 6: Lights! Camera! Transaction! 
o　　Week 7: Crimes of Fashion 
o　　Week 8: Barking Up the Wrong Tree
o　　Week 9: MIDTERM 
o　　Week 10: A Tale of Two Leaders 
o　　Week 11: Bringing Down the House 
o　　Week 12: Runaway Pride 
o　　Week 13: The Butt Stops Here 
o　　Week 14: The Pepsi Challenged 
o　　Week 15: Sweet & Lowdown 
o　　Week 16: Intellectual Horsepower 
o　　Week 17: Review
o　　Week 18: FINAL
scorePolicy:
1. Weekly Group Discussion and Report: 30%
2. Midterm (Individual): 35%
3. Final (Individual): 35%
materials:
1. The Apprentice Video
2. CNN Key Expressions
